item.title: Notes on Mathematical Proofs
item.description: Wrote by a MSc student dying of end-of-term reviews (a.k.a. me). [x] PS1 [x] PS2 [ ] PS3 [ ] Logic Truth table PS1.Q1 Let \(p\) and \(q\) be two statements Prove that \(\lnot (p \lor q) \iff \lnot p \land \lnot q\). \(p\) \(\lnot p\) \(q\) \(\lnot q\) \(p \lor q\) \(\lnot (p \lor q)\) T F T F T F T F F T T F F T T F T F F T F T F T Direct proof PS2.
